scripts.minify: minify style.css > minified-style.css; minify brain.js sound.js > minified-code.js;
scripts.build: yarn run minify || npm run minify; bash copy-to-public-folder.sh;
scripts.continuous-restart: nodemon -x 'yarn run build; yarn run start' --ignore public --ignore 'minified*.*'
scripts.npm-continuous-restart: nodemon -x 'npm run build; npm run start' --ignore public --ignore 'minified*.*'; killall -9 node;

hooks.pre-commit: echo; echo 'Reminder: Did you build first?'; echo; npm test; echo; echo 'Reminder: Did you build first?'; echo;
